title: COUNCIL DRAFT — GAME GUIDE
description: A strategic discussion game in which players draft a council of real historical and living figures to negotiate humanity’s survival against an alien corporate power. Designed to surface values, philosophies, and ethical tradeoffs through play rather than argument.
author: Aleksandr

fieldDefinitions.phase: The Bloom phase expressing the symbolic and psychological state in which the work was created.

fieldDefinitions.motifMap: Key symbolic elements and their meanings as they appear within the work.

motifMap.meaning: Collective wisdom formed through tension and diversity

associatedMedia.description: Text-based game guide published on Substack.
